title: 81/601/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1981 on aid to maintain farm incomes in 1980 granted by the French Government (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 July 1981 on aid to maintain farm incomes in 1980 granted by the French Government (Only the French text is authentic) (81/601/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aid for maintaining farm incomes for 1980, notified by the French Government to the Commission on 14 February 1981, as published in Decree 81-59, is in the case of products covered by common market organizations, incompatible with the provisions of Article 92 of the EEC Treaty and the relevant common market organizations it must accordingly be abolished.
The French Republic shall inform the Commission, within one month from notification of this Decision, of the measures taken to ensure compliance with this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 July 1981.
For the Commission
The President
Gaston THORN
